attributes.action: Cancel The 20mph Scheme in Edinburgh & Use The Funds To Improve Edinburgh Roads
attributes.additional_details: The 20mph scheme introduced for Edinburgh on the 28th Fed, 2017.
attributes.background: Pedestrians think the car slows down to let them cross the road & they walk out to cross, and the cars have to break immediately. The new scheme should be cancelled, and should use the funds to improve the roads and potholes in Edinburgh, as there're too many broken roads in Edinburgh!

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
